data.title: Australia's own
data.meta_description: Ampol connects our proud history with everything our business is known for today, our trusted high-quality products, our commitment to customer service, local communities and the largest leading transport fuels network in Australia.
data.text:
On the road and craving a delicious deal? At Ampol Foodary, we’ve got you covered.

Until September 3, Crave ‘N Save a Four ‘N Twenty King Size Sausage Roll 180g and your choice of a drink from the Dare 500mL or Mount Franklin 600mL ranges for only $5*.

*Offer ends 03/09/24. Participating Products: Four ‘N Twenty King Size Sausage Roll 180g range/Dare 500mL range/Mount Franklin 600ml range. Available at Ampol Foodary participating stores. Savings displayed are based off RRP for products when sold together at participating stores. Not in conjunction with any other offer. Products must be purchased in the same transaction. Product and range availability may vary by store. While stocks last.

Download the Ampol app to pay for fuel from your phone using FuelPay, or charge your EV using AmpCharge.

And until 1 October 2024, you can get a free regular coffee with every FuelPay or AmpCharge transaction at participating Ampol Foodary locations. Use our in-app site locator to find your nearest Ampol Foodary and make sure to keep an eye out for exclusive in-app offers.

*T&Cs apply.
